subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner, ranked 22nd and unseeded, continued his roll of upsets at the Western & Southern Open by defeating No. 7 Juan Martín del Potro. He will face No. 4 seed Rafael Nadal in the final.
snippet: John Isner, ranked 22nd and unseeded, continued his roll of upsets at the Western & Southern Open by defeating No. 7 Juan Martín del Potro. He will face No. 4 seed Rafael Nadal in the final.
